name: The Jasper Principle
description: This is a Stanley Parable inspired Twine game, loosely based on the world view of Nick Breckon. It was created for the Idle Thumbs Winter Wizard Jam 2015. Note: the intro VO takes a moment to start playing for some reason. Give it a sec before you click. If you get the "Your browser couldn't save the state of the story" when opening, just click it off. The story still functions.
